RelatedSentence: If Shakespeare were alive and invited to give the commencement address at a major American university , the favorite spring sport on campus would explode with loud and shrill protest .
Blacks could object to Othello , the angry , erring barbarian wife - murderer .
Jews could protest Shylock , the stereotypical Jewish moneylender demanding his pound of flesh .
Jews could protest Shylock , the stereotypical Jewish moneylender demanding his pound of flesh .
Ageists would decry a senile Lear .
Feminists would despise Lady Macbeth , the Bard 's most powerful woman , as a power - seeking termagant .
